item.title: dracut
item.description: Dracut # Used to create a new initrd or to change the initrd. Linux manual online voor dracut Fedore: dracut problems Fedore: grub2 onder Linux # lsinitrd dracut -force # maak generic initramfs Summary of dracut kernel command line options A selection of the most common debugging related dracut options: rd.shell Drop to a shell, if the initramfs fails. rd.debug Set -x for the dracut shell. rd.break=[cmdline|pre-udev|pre-trigger|initqueue|pre-mount|mount|pre-pivot|cleanup] Set udev to loglevel info rd.
